description: President Bush toured Walter Reed Army Medical Center on Friday for the first time since The Washington Post reported on substandard conditions there. I apologize for what they went through, and were going to fix the problem, he said.

title: On the Lam by the Thousands, Pursued by the Dozens
description: THE math isnt pretty. As of February, there were an estimated 636,000 fugitive aliens in the United States  foreigners who have ignored orders to leave the country. They may have entered illegally and been caught (about 60 percent of all fugitives), or they may have visited legally but then overstayed their visas or committed crimes.

title: Buick Supers, Old and New
Always Al: Three Stories
description: It has been 30 years since Al McGuire walked away from coaching college basketball. He did it here in Atlanta after Marquette defeated North Carolina in the Omni, which has since been demolished.

title: Fearless Predictions
description: Faithful readers, hold me accountable in October when the Diamondbacks wind up beating the Twins in the World Series, Jeremy Bonderman wins a Cy Young Award and Chase Utley wins an M.V.P. These are just predictions. Some are long shots, some are educated guesses and some, like picking Johan Santana, are no-brainers. Feel free to add yours in the comments section, and well evaluate in October.

title: Torre Gives a Hint at the Lineup
description: Were wrapping up the spring here at Legends Field, and Joe Torre answered all the roster questions yesterday. Everyones just hoping to make it through one more day with no injuries. Theyll have a workout at Yankee Stadium tomorrow before the opener against Tampa Bay on Monday afternoon.

title: Scott Who?
description: If the Mets didnt have to play the Devil Rays in St. Petersburg this afternoon, then I never would have been able to see such sights as Dustys Camper Ranch, the Next2Nothing Ranch and the Panther Crossing: Next 13 Miles sign during my drive across the state last night. I also couldnt have caught up with the D-Rays 23-year-old opening-day starter, Scott Kazmir. Remember him?

title: A Little Grit to go with Your Gravy
description: This is a dirty job, but someones got to do it. Break down todays games, that is.

title: Obama Is First in Their Second Life
description: The Times regularly brings you reporting from Baghdad, Moscow and Des Moines. But can any of those datelines really compare to SILICON ISLAND, SECOND LIFE? Today, we plunged into the briny depths and even teleported to bring you todays preview of grassroots action going on this afternoon in support of Senator Barack Obama in Second Life, where the devotion is real even if the reality is only virtual.

title: Sundays Breakfast Menu
description: There are only two courses this week, with a side dish of presidential politics. With Attorney General Alberto Gonzaless claims of ignorance about the United States attorney dismissals facing direct contradiction this week by his former aide, D. Kyle Sampson, the heightening controversy is likely to be front and center once again on the Sunday news shows.

title: Obama Storms Into Iowa
description: ONAWA, Iowa  Its raining here in Onawa. Thundering and lightning, too. Light pieces of hail also could be on the way.

title: Why Even Play the Season? Predictions 2007
description: Like everyone else who can hold a pencil, I filled out an N.C.A.A. tournament bracket this year. And I finished dead last in the press box pool. Dead last. Thanks, Rick Pitino.

title: Ants On The Floor
description: Its a long way to the floor of the Georgia Dome from the upper deck. Good thing for Rick Simmons maybe.

title: Any Minute Now
description: The Ohio State big man sat and sat and sat

title: Remembering Jason Ray
description: The four mascots for the teams in the Final Four wore black arm bands with an outline in Carolina blue of a ram.

title: Comments The Hand Behind the Taliban
description: Nicks Sunday column is based on his interview with Afganistans President Hamid Karzai. President Karzai was quite unhappy with Pakistan. You can read the transcript or watch the video. Heres the complete audio from the interview.

title: Oden Plays
description: Just in case one of the 10 TV cameras is not watching the Ohio State bench let The Bracket clue you in.
